relation: What text will be inside bar. Can be HTML or just text.
How long bar will be delayed, doesn't count animation time.
How long this bar will be slided up and down.
Custom jQuery object for notify bar.
You can define own CSS class for Notify bar. There are too premade classes "error", "warning" and "success".
If set to true close button will be displayed.
Sets the text to close button.
If enabled, user can hide notify bar just by click on it.
If enabled, user can hide notify bar just by moving mouse cursor on it (suitable for really lazy people).
Set the position of notify bar. Possible values are top, bottom.
textBeforeTable: Options }); }); position: "bottom" cssClass: "Appear at bottom", html: "Hi from below!", jQuery.notifyBar({ jQuery(function () {  Usage position at bottom }); }); animationSpeed: "normal" delay: 2000, html: "Thank you, your settings were updated!", jQuery.notifyBar({ jQuery(function () { Usage > bower install jqnotifybar Installation Simple plugin (basically it's not a plugin, but widget) to show notify bar (like on Twitter's webpage).
